ISSUE.TITLE: WP_JSON_Posts->prepare_author() needs check that $user exists
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In the prepare_author method there is a conditional early return if the $author parameter wasn't passed, we should add an additional condition to verify the $user object was returned. This is a minor bug in the logic, but it can happen if a user account was removed but the deleted user's posts weren't re-assigned. Pull request with minor fix forthcoming.
